publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5071 Frances Curran: Supporting Staff at James Watt College—That the Parliament congratulates the EIS and Unison members at James Watt College for defending jobs and wages against an intimidatory and bullying style of management from the college board; further believes that the only way to restore good industrial relations at the college is for college Principal, Bill Wardle, to resign, and offers continued solidarity to staff at the college and continues to support their just campaign to protect jobs and wage levels. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-5071 Frances Curran: Supporting Staff at James Watt College—That the Parliament congratulates the EIS and Unison members at James Watt College for defending jobs and wages against an intimidatory and bullying style of management from the college board; further believes that the only way to restore good industrial relations at the college is for college Principal, Bill Wardle, to resign, and offers continued solidarity to staff at the college and continues to support their just campaign to protect jobs and wage levels.
